Title: Amuse-Bouche
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Jim Danger Gray
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: Will and Jack hunt a killer who is burying his victims alive, so they will become fertilizer for his garden of fungus. While the tabloid journalist Freddie sets targets in on Will.
